content: Atten-HUT! I'm General Brasch Super Earth's oldest and most grizzled war hero and I'm not easy to impress. Helldiver training is the toughest test in the galaxy but I can tell that doesn't scare you. Impressive.
That's the flag of Super Earth recruit! Plant it in the designated area and make sure you show it the proper respect
Hooold up recruit it's finally time to call in the big guns. Use the support weapon strategem to get yourself a real weapon
I've never seen such flawless terminal activation... Now somewhere around here is the flag of Super Earth. Find it and plant it where all can see its democratic glory
That's the flag of Super Earth recruit! Plant it in the designated area
There... good as new. Now look sharp! You're about to encounter democracy's sworn enemy recruit!
Impeccable! Like I always say: the best simulation is a real simulation. Now activate the battlefield injury simulator!
Now *there's* a Helldiver. You remind me of a younger me: fearless, invulnerable, and seven feet tall.
What a fine soldier. Your brother in arms a battle-forged bond that could never be replaced!
In all my years I've never witnessed such acrobatic perfection! I think you're ready for our highly realistic battlefield simulator. That's right! The real deal
Use a strategem now to take care of those bugs. Juust make sure you take a few steps back...
Plant the flag in front of that statue recruit

Man down! Don't sweat it soldier friendly-fire is just an unavoidable fact of life. Nothing at all you can do to prevent it. What you can do is use the reinforcement strategem to replace your fallen comrade
Grit your teeth soldier! Grab that stim and patch yourself up
Next lesson: Helldivers fight in squads. Meet your new squadmate
Load up soldier because playtime's over. You've reached your final test. THIS... is the real deal! Get to it!
Those unthinking bugs never stood a chance against a genius tactical mind like yourself. You are literally invincible!
This area is in dire need of liberation from the terminid scourge. Activate that terminal!
Piece of advice: moving around makes it hard to aim. For A-list accuracy stay still while you shoot
What a catapault of an arm! On to the next section
Load yourself up recruit! This is the real deal. It's just you the gun in your hands and two-thousand megatons of explosives in close orbit. That's IT!
Step up to the platform recruit! You've earned it
There it is... a terminid! The scourge of liberty! Arm yourself and show that bug the true meaning of freedom!
Look up in the sky recruit... That there is a superdestroyer and its all-powerful strategems are yours to command!
Now enough jib-jab! The upcoming obstacles will take everything your exceptional physique can muster. This is it: the real deal. Get to it soldier!
Make sure you show it the proper respect
Your finally ready for the realest deal of them all: the galactic war. Liberty! Democracy! Justice! They're in your hands now. General Brasch over... and out!
Well done soldier. It takes uncommon resolve to move past the death of your ally with so little pause
Dead-eye precision! Now use a grenade to close up that bug hole! Otherwise they'll just keep comin'
Until now. Here's your real lesson soldier: squad mates can and will perish tragically all the time. Now use the reinforcement strategem to have another Helldiver take their place!
That's the stuff! Now use a resupply strategem to get yourself some more ammo!
Ah... the will of democracy! Good work
Glorious work recruit! Already you've advanced the cause of democracy farther than any soldier I've ever seen! You've proved your worth... you're ready... to don your cape
